content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information about receiving a claimant’s request to withdraw a pending initial claim, including
who may withdraw an initial claim and what types of claims may be withdrawn
acceptable means for requesting withdrawal of a claim
requests for claim withdrawal in exam cancellations
timeliness requirement for submitting a request to withdraw a claim
effect of the withdrawal of a claim
claimant’s right to retract a request to withdraw a claim
, and
example of the effect that withdrawal of a claim has on a claim that VA ultimately grants
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section F - Withdrawal of Initial Claims
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section F
